result.execSummary:
The defendant Ivan Ramirez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay fine of $100 plus costs including the DNA surcharge.  Bond posted is to be applied to the fine and costs.  Any remaining amount to be on deposit for 15TR2625.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ivan Ramirez in court with attorney Ryan Drengler. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
3:41 p.m.  Court calls the case. 
  
Plea questionnaire/Agreement filed.
Prosecutor states plea agreement.
Attorney for Defendant concurs with agreement stated.

Defendant enters a plea of:  NO CONTEST

Court questions Defendant regarding plea.
Court informs Defendant of Constitutional Rights. Court advises Defendant of Elements State must prove for the Charge.
Court questions Attorney for Defendant.
Court finds Defendant's Plea is freely, voluntarily and intelligently made.
Attorneys stipulate that there is factual basis for the charge(s).

BY THE COURT:
Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charge(s).
Court finds the defendant guilty.  Clerk directed to enter Judgment of Conviction this date.

Atty Cousins makes sentencing arguments to the Court. 
Atty Drengler makes sentencing arguments to the Court.  Defendant agrees to have the remainder of his bond be held for his OWI case. 

BY THE COURT:
Serve 10 days jail. 
8 days credit
Pay fine of $100 plus costs including the DNA surcharge. 
Submit a DNA sample. 
Bond posted to be applied to the fine and costs.  Any remaining about to be on deposit for 15TR2625.

Court notes the defendant has voluntarily appeared here today and has had support from an individual he is residing with.

11:40 a.m. Attorney Ryan Drengler in court. ADA Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State request warrant.  Defendant Ivan Ramirez not in court. Cass W Cousins.  appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BTC:Warrant $150 cash alternative
The $1,000 cash bond on file is ordered forfeited.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

11:32 a.m. Attorney Ryan Drengler in court. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is not present, bonded out of jail yesterday.  Atty Drengler did not have a chance to let the Defendant know the court date was scheduled for today.  Matter rescheduled.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ivan Ramirez appeared by video. Attorney Ryan Drengler in court. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Gilberto Lira is present and indicates the defendant will be staying with him at the address provided. 
Attorney/Defendant received copy of criminal complaint.
Court informs defendant of charges and maximum penalties.
Attorney/Defendant waives reading of complaint.

NOT GUILTY plea entered.

BY THE COURT:  Bond Continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.
